mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( NAME, ACTION, PARENT_ID, SORT_NUM, ICON, REMARK ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{action}, #{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId}, #{sortNum}, #{icon}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET NAME = #{name}, ACTION = #{action}, PARENT_ID = #{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId}, SORT_NUM = #{sortNum}, ICON = #{icon}, REMARK = #{remark} WHERE MENU_PERMISSION_ID = #{menuPermissionId}

choose.when: SELECT 'menu' AS TYPE, MENU_PERMISSION_ID AS ID, NAME as NAME, ACTION as ACTION, IFNULL(PARENT_ID,0)AS PARENTID, REMARK as REMARK, SORT_NUM as SORTNUM, ICON AS ICON FROM sys_menu UNION SELECT 'operation' AS TYPE, OPERATION_PERMISSION_ID AS ID, NAME as NAME, ACTION as ACTION, IFNULL(MENU_PERMISSION_ID,0)AS PARENTID, REMARK as REMARK, 0, null FROM sys_operation

SELECT 'menu' AS TYPE, MENU_PERMISSION_ID AS ID, NAME as NAME, ACTION as ACTION, nvl(PARENT_ID,0)AS PARENTID, REMARK as REMARK, SORT_NUM as SORTNUM, ICON AS ICON FROM sys_menu UNION SELECT 'operation' AS TYPE, OPERATION_PERMISSION_ID AS ID, NAME as NAME, ACTION as ACTION, nvl(MENU_PERMISSION_ID,0)AS PARENTID, REMARK as REMARK, 0, null FROM sys_operation

mapper.select: select menu_Permission_Id from sys_role_menu where ROLE_ID=#{roleId}

choose.when: select IFNULL(max(SORT_NUM),0) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID=#{parentId}
choose.otherwise: select IFNULL(max(SORT_NUM),0) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID is null

choose.when: select nvl(max(SORT_NUM),0) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID=#{parentId}
choose.otherwise: select nvl(max(SORT_NUM),0) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID is null

choose.when: select IFNULL(SORT_NUM,0) from sys_menu where MENU_PERMISSION_ID=#{menuPermissionId}
select NVL(SORT_NUM,0) from sys_menu where MENU_PERMISSION_ID=#{menuPermissionId}

mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_menu where parent_id=#{menuPermissionId}

select * from sys_menu where PARENT_ID=#{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId} and sort_Num=( select min(SORT_NUM) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID=#{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId} and SORT_NUM>#{sortNum} )

select * from sys_menu where PARENT_ID=#{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId} and sort_Num=( select max(SORT_NUM) from sys_menu where PARENT_ID=#{sysMenuPermission.menuPermissionId} and SORT_NUM<#{sortNum} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set SORT_NUM=#{sortNum} where MENU_PERMISSION_ID=#{menuPermissionId}
mapper.select: select smp.* from sys_menu smp, sys_role_menu srmp, sys_user_role sur where sur.ROLE_ID=srmp.ROLE_ID and smp.MENU_PERMISSION_ID=srmp.MENU_PERMISSION_ID and sur.USER_ID=#{userId}
